11533222121.content:
Hayley Smith rubbed her thumb over the keycard after she came back to reality. She briefly flashed back to the reason why she decided to embark on a sudden vacation.

There was just too much.

Too much to handle at home to get a good night’s sleep or a moment of peace. Let alone relax for a few minutes thanks to another one of Roger’s zany antics.

Luckily, a simple three-hour drive was enough to separate the rebellious hippie from the madness that is currently her family. Hayley needed just a week or two of being pampered, indulged, and relaxed before she even thought about returning home. Check in at the hotel was simple and easy enough to get Hayley to her room in just minutes. She slid the key card into the door labeled ‘Room 403’ and pushed it open.

Her eyes took in the posh presentation of the room. Beige and white colors decorated the bed while a simple patterned carpet cushioned her sandals. Hayley tossed her luggage aside and approached the stand in front of the wide three-person couch, “Wow! Talk about welcoming. A platter full of cheesecake cupcakes and wine? Think I found my own little getaway.”

Hayler grabbed one of the many cupcakes, which was easily greater than the size of her own hand and started munching away. Meanwhile, she popped off the cork and began nursing the wine bottle. Stealing a few sips at a time to chase the bites of cupcake.

Each cupcake looked as carefully decorated as the last with striking swirls of icing covering the top with a plump cherry perched right at the peak. The presentation based on the design of the cupcakes alone kept Hayley’s hands reaching for more. Then, it wasn’t long before the platter had become nothing more than scattered crumbs of cheesecake and icing and the bottle of wine completely empty of liquid.

“Gone already? I must’ve been hungrier than I thought.” Hayley looked around the room for nearby food. Nothing. She pressed her hands on her full and bloated stomach. She felt guilt crawl up her neck about eating, but at the same time, “I am here to relax.” She rolled to her side to grab the hotel phone, “Hello? Room Service? I’d like another tray of those cupcakes and wine…oh and can I have a large-no-extra large vegetarian pizza…better make that double. Thanks!”

After a short five minute wait, Hayley received her order that was wheeled right into her room. She looked on with anticipation and even unbuttoned her jeans. She picked up the first slice of pizza and bit into the gooey mixture of cheese, dough, and finely baked vegetables.

Hayley reclined back on the couch and unbuttoned her jeans.

“I should’ve done this a long time ago.”
11533222121.title: Hayley's sudden getaway

She wiped away the remaining frosting with her forearm and set the empty bottle on the night stand. She immediately took notice of her distended stomach then tugged down on the black tank top that covered her torso.

“I really should walk this off. Might as well check out the Hotel while I’m at it.” Hayley rolled from the bed, stepped over empty pizza boxes, and reached down under her belly. The area she stepped in appeared much like the lavish interior of an upscale mall.

From her current view she could see venues ranging from Arcades to Jewelry Stores to plenty of restaurants. Hayley set her path forward, intending to see everything.

During her exploration, Hayley took in the sights to keep her mind off the new potbelly and muffin top combo that jiggled around her waist. To her right, the ‘Bulge Bakery’ had many freshly baked samples put out for residents to try. Hayley approached, feeling particularly attracted to the cinnamon rolls that were, to her surprise, larger than her own head.

“This is way more than a sample.” Hayley held one in her hand. Regardless of still feeling bloating from the meal before, she needed to have a taste, “Just one little bite. Then back to walking.”

Shortly after Hayley returned to venturing the area and the cinnamon roll display is short three rolls. The button fastening Hayley’s pants burst and flew off into an unknown direction. The surrounding sites distracted Hayley from the subtle event. Even with the belt fitting more snug around her waist.

One attraction that caught Hayley’s eye is named the Slob Sauna. The tag line “Let yourself go.” underlined right beneath the name caught her interest. She couldn’t see past the foggy windows, leaving her imagination to wonder what was really inside.

Another venue is called the Lazy Lounge with a diagram showed a reclining chair with mechanical arms feeding the relaxed individual as they watch television.

“Sounds like my kind of place.” Hayley remarked.

Then there was the Poolside Buffet, a pair of double doors led to the exterior of the hotel where Hayley could spot an Olympic sized swimming pool full of chocolate pudding surrounded by jacuzzis and a buffet that went on for miles.

“Good thing I packed my bathing suit.”

Hayley’s nose picked up a familiar musty stench. One turn of a glance, brought Hayley towards something that would make her jaw drop.

“Oh my god!”

A brightly lit green neon sign flashed the words ‘Weed and Feed: A Hungry Stoners Paradise’. “This place really does have everything! Have I died and gone to Amsterdam?!” Hayley struggles not to fall to her knees before the sight. A weed dispensery with a wall of free snacks is just a few feet ahead of her.

“I can’t just stand around! I need to make the most out of my vacation! What should I do first?”

1153322222211.content:
Seventy-two hours into Susan's accidental stay at the Hotel of Gluttony and she's found herself a new heaven. No work, no family to bother her, loads of free time, and as much food as she could eat. What more could a woman want?

A few days ago, Susan booked a trip to the spa in New York to unwind from the stress of seeing her son come home injured from fighting magical creatures. Not to mention, work at her catering business has been piling up ceaselessly. There used to be a feeling of extreme satisfaction from dealing with all of this, but lately she's gotten burned out.

Hotel of Gluttony provided Susan with a fresh new environment. An environment that pushed delectable food in huge portions by pasting images and directions to the dining hall just about everywhere. During the trip to drop her belongings off in her state room, Susan spotted a map of the Hotel. "Hmm. There's a gym. A pool. A movie theater. A jewelry store. Coffee shop. Mystery room?" Her eyes dropped down the massive list, "It just goes on and on...Just how big is this place anyway?"

"That's enough of that."

Now, three days later, Susan ended her workout early. Fifty minutes early to be exact. Due to mixture of exhaustion and hunger gnawing at her appetite. Although the exhaustion ended the workout Susan made a quick beeline to the dining hall. Truth is, Susan has been having trouble keeping her mind off of food. She didn't want to admit to the possibility of a food addiction or that her aerobics outfit felt more snug than it did some days ago.

This morning, Susan's breakfast started off with a bowl of oatmeal and a plate of eggs then ended with a table toppling with slices of chocolate cake, slabs of meat, and alcoholic drinks.

Basically every meal Susan took part in turned into a massive feast of carbs, butter, fried foods. Basically anything she formerly wouldn't allow herself to enjoy on a regular basis like this. "Just one more plate" or "I have to try this" became the typical excuse to cram more food down her throat until her stomach hit the table.

Eating all of the delicious food the hotel served until she hit her limit gave Susan a new feeling of extreme satisfaction just like the one she got burnt out on.

"...Ah...all of this excessive eating is going to catch up with me." smiled Susan, cradling her bloated stomach as she left the dining hall. "I should just enjoy myself in the meantime. It's not everyday I can eat like this." Susan thought about the extra pounds that would come from this, but she let Future Susan worry about a couple of calories.

All she wanted was a nice walk around the hotel, maybe a nap, and then another trip to the dining hall.

Now, what happens to Susan during this new daily routine?
1153322222211.title: Susan Long (Jake's Mom)

11533222222111.content:
“Just one more...”

That’s what she said an hour ago. The direct moment when she felt full. Susan’s hand reaches for the plate and pulls it forward. A whole Devil’s Food cake with sweet chocolate frosting with bright red cherries on top is all hers. Susan proceeds to eat the entire cake with reckless abandon relating to her diet that she’s long forgotten about.

Susan Long never lost control of her appetite moreso that she’s begun to crave more and more food every time to she gets hungry. Instead of questioning or worrying about such a mysterious ordeal she simply let herself loose and enjoy herself for however long it will last.

Because of this newfound love of gluttony Susan’s slim, curvy figure ballooned into a luscious bodacious bloated body. Her blue jeans that hugged her hips and thighs struggled against the recent increase in girth, now fitting closer to a second skin. Even the loose bell bottoms of the pants clung to her chunkier knees and calves.

Cake crumbs tumbled from her chubby face and onto her trademark green shirt that stretched along with the growth of her belly. At this point her shirt couldn’t even conceal the round bottom portion of her stomach nor her bellybutton.

Susan lapped up the remaining icing from the plate just before getting herself out of the chair, “Whoops,” Susan muttered. The arm rests of the chair stuck to her big round ass. Susan wriggled her hips until the chair fell back onto the ground.

“I’ve really let myself go.”

Since her stomach reached the point of painfully full she left the buffet completely satisfied yet curious of what she should do until she next gets hungry. She ran her open palms over her taut stomach while finding the next place to spend her time.

Where should she go next?

132221.content:
In recent memory, Daisy couldn’t think of a single time that she was able to enjoy herself. “Work. Work. Work. That’s all I’ve been doing,” she sighed, somewhat exhausted already from only thinking about it. Being a Princess of Sarasaland isn’t as easy and luxurious as everyone thinks it is. Signing royal decrees, addressing the public, so on and so fourth. Daisy felt like there needed to be something somewhere in this hotel where she could enjoy herself. Daisy traveled from her room to the lobby in hopes of something exciting happening.

And then...

“Something smells great.” Daisy turned on her heel then slowly inched forward, closer towards the source of the attracting aroma. She followed the scent down a short corridor to be met with a pleasant surprise.

“Oh my-!”

A grand buffet hall filled with food from around the world. The buffet spanned to the size of a castle foyer with every inch of appropriate space holding enormous amounts of food. Daisy is quick to succumb to the urge to eat and grabbed a tray which she piled succulent cuts of meat, buttered bread, creamy soups, and more on top. Daisy had never been one to closely watch what she ate, unlike Princess Peach, surely she would enjoy the food far more than anyone else.

During her feast, she couldnt bother to slow herself down since the demand to taste more overcame her senses, “...That is good...” Daisy huffed, she snatched a large bite of a turkey leg and dove right back in.

After what seemed to feel like an hour, Daisy managed to satisfy her hunger. She rested back in her chair with one hand gently rubbed her turgid stomach.

Just then, Daisy’s nose picked up a sweet scent. A scent so strong that she no longer felt full instead feeling hungry and curious. She turned to see rows of freshly baked pastries: cakes, pies, donuts, eclairs, set out on the buffet tables.

Princess Daisy helped herself to a few slices of cake and fed herself by hand. The cake tasted incredibly rich, downright bursting with unique flavor. Each slice pushed Daisy’s stomach to the limit, however she couldn’t stop herself from cramming more into her mouth.

“I’m going to love it here...I wonder what other stuff this place has.”

132222.content:
Daisy looked back at the beach.

It’s not often that her toes get to squish the wet sand.

In a moment, she slips on her orange bathing suit complete with the Daisy emblem on her chest. Right outside the double doors from the lobby Daisy is greeted by the brief blinding sun shining over the tanned sand and bright blue water.

With the sun so hot the thought of ice cream for breakfast didn’t sound so bad. Daisy thought a scoop or two wouldn’t hurt if she had a balanced meal later in the day. The toad handed her a ice cream cone topped with a hearty scoop of pink strawberry ice cream. Daisy took a seat at the beach chair perched perfectly in front of the ocean.

Daisy felt guilty for even having more thoughts about the ice cream. The taste alone beckoned her to get more. She needed to do something to free herself from the cravings.

Daisy then asked the toad for an ice cream with two, bigger scoops of both vanilla and chocolate. She hoped that the bigger servings would quench her craving of the creamy delights. Yet, after finishing both scoops and the cone. Daisy wanted another.

When Daisy sat forward, she felt a roll of fat squish against her lap.

“Ah, my swimsuit feels…tight?”, A thick pair of love handles, and a definite muffin top took vacancy on her torso. Daisy’s shame showed through the 3rd time she asked for another cone. Daisy felt gracious as the Toad handed her another sizable cone with even bigger scoops included with an unjudgmental smile and constant offerings for more ice cream.

To which she continuously accepted with a chubby smile.

However, Daisy couldn’t stop herself from greatly enjoying the ice cream and having thoughts of getting more. The short trip from the chair to the ice cream stand became more strenuous each time. Her footsteps along the sand felt heavier along with the jiggling along her shapely rear end that completely enveloped the bottom half of her swimsuit. Her weight gain is made more obvious by the stretching of her one piece. Even the emblem on her chest stretched along her filling breasts that had grown of B cups to DD cups. Daisy’s belly grew from the simple muffin top and love handles to a round gut that bobbed up and down with each step.

Daisy gripped the ice cream cone that is three big scoops high with a chocolate dipped waffle cone. She couldn’t wait to get back to the chair before she started.

This time she sank far into the beach chair, giving the straps holding the chair together a real struggle. Her back and leg fat seeped through the straps. Nevertheless, Daisy continued to lick away at the ice cream cone far more concerned about what flavor she should get next rather than the mysterious weight gain afflicting her.

In a blink of an eye, the ice cream had already been eaten. Daisy jumped at her own gluttony in surprise, yet already started the motions for getting another one.

Daisy gripped both sides of the beach chair and pushed with all her might. The combination of the extra weight and her increased size made it difficult to escape from the chair’s sudden grasp. Her soft, meaty arms were enough to get away.

“I…*huff*…I can’t…”

“Princess Daisy?”

The voice from behind stopped Daisy of her struggle. The bloated Princess turned her head around to see…

1332212.content:
Chara let out a huge burp as she finished her second milkshake, the loud noise reverberating around her small hotel room. She lay back after that burp, her hands going to her very stuffed belly and beginning to rub as it churned and gurgled away, obviously angry at her sudden gluttony.
The poor girl was beginning to slip into a food coma, the veritable feast she’d just eaten weighing her mind down. She lay back on the bed, rubbing her belly and burping every now and then as she slipped off to sleep.

Wait, why had she eaten so much? Her tired eyes opened a little, her mind kicking and whirring as the shock at the incredible size of her five-year-old-bodies appetite sunk in. She grunted and managed to heave herself into a sitting position, her stuffed belly groaning as she moved it around and squished it.

Once she managed to get up-right Chara looked down at her body to assess the damage. Her once toned and flat belly now sat out like a watermelon had made its way into her stomach, the poor gurgling mound obstructing Chara’s view of her small exercise shorts with its size, the swollen lump so large it was only half covered by her once form fitting shirt.
Chara sat rubbing her belly for a while, trying to remember just how much food she’d eaten in her gluttonous rampage. There’d been the two milkshakes of course, a few decent sized burgers, a hotdog, the large fries, the huge slice of triple chocolate cake, the tub of strawberry ice cream, and that was just what she could remember.

And it’d all been so delicious she hadn’t wanted to stop. In fact, if she hadn’t needed to let out that huge burp she likely wouldn’t have stopped at all. Suddenly the five year old’s mind began to spin with images of her eating and eating eternally, her belly inflating like a balloon as her feast continued, until her belly was as round as a beach ball, anchoring her to the bed and forcing her to continue her feast forever.
Chara looked up and around to try and distract herself from her growing panic and confusion, her eyes landing on the food cart which had delivered her feast to her in the first place. Instantly her panic subsided, her mind instantly sunk back into the haze she’d experienced while eating, her heart rate slowing and her mouth-watering despite her overburdened stomach’s angry noises.

The cart was still so full, another feast the size she’d already eaten waiting upon it, if not a little more. More cakes and pies and burgers and roasts and curries and ice cream and milkshakes and soda. Slowly Chara’s hand moved out to grab a delicious looking slice of apple and cinnamon pie.
Suddenly Chara’s mind kicked it self again and her hand slapped back onto her belly. How had she gotten distracted again so easily! Her anxiety turned to frustration, and she decided she was going to get up and figure out who’d made this food and why it had such an odd effect on her.
Her first step was to move the food cart she’d pulled up to her so she could eat on the bed, and then she’d be able to walk out and track down the mastermind of this fattening scheme.

Just move the cart, she re-asserted. But already she could feel her conviction fading. She slowly moved her hand out to the handles of the cart to move it, but found that as her frustration faded, her appetite increased.

The stuffed five-year old’s hand slowly moved over to the piece of pie again, her mouth beginning to water, again despite the angry gurgling coming from her newly rounded mid-section. She tried to wake herself back up and stop but the delicious smell was flooding her nostrils and she just couldn’t stop.

The second her hand hit the pie she instantly pulled it to her mouth. The crunchy sweet pastry and soft baked apple blended together between the five-year old’s teeth and quickly found their way down into her full stomach. Chara let out an involuntary moan as the heavy mouthful hit her stomach, which forced the poor organ to release another labored groan.
It just tasted so good, and she just couldn’t bring herself to stop eating and get up.

So, she didn’t.


A couple of hours later the constant chewing, burping, moaning and groaning which had been all the sound that’d come from the hotel room Chara had been put into ceased suddenly with a soft thump.
Chara lay on her bed which she had just collapsed back upon, an empty food cart at her feet and a huge basketball sized belly sticking up from her once flat stomach. Her eyes where closed and her shirt was now rolled all the way above her belly, revealing the disproportionate lump to the air as she massaged it in an attempt to sooth the storm rolling around inside her.

Her stomach was beyond stuffed, she’d eaten enough food for a family of six all by herself, and felt like she couldn’t fit another bite in there if her life had depended upon it.
She was trying so hard to be angry at herself for falling to the feast once again, to open back up that font of frustration which had nearly motivated her to get up and escape this trap, but her poor tired brain and sore stomach just wouldn’t let her, all she wanted to do was sleep.

So the very conflicted five year old girl lay on the bed rubbing her stomach, moaning and groaning and releasing gas whenever her packed stomach wanted her too until she fell into a deep, deep food coma from which she wouldn’t awaken for a long while.

1353121.content:
Emily had been looking forward to this vacation when Lena "Tracer" Oxton had informed her that she had finally gotten some much needed R&R approved.

The world always needed more heroes but heroes also needed time with their loved ones and while this wasn't exactly what the redhead had envisioned at first this hotel did appear to be something out of a 5* listing. It was deluxe seemingly high class and Emily worried that she and her love wouldn't be able to afford their stay.

"No worries luv Winston says it's all paid for."

Well she trusted the brilliant scientist, who also happened to be a gorilla, so if Lena was okay with everything then she would be too. So the pair entered the place and it very much was as fancy as they believed it to be.

As they approached the front desk the pair caught sight of some of the other guests some that were checking in were of average weight, there were others a little bit chubby, and still others were quite...heavy although the ladies were kind and polite enough to not make rude comments.

Having reached the front desk they were greeted by a super cute desk clerk, a bit of a belly noticeable even though her shirt and jacket and slightly chubby thighs exposed to the world thanks to her skirt.

"Welcome we were informed of your visit Ms. Oxton. We're happy to have you and..."

"This is my girl, Emily." Lena stated happily introducing the redhead beside her, "Hope that isn't a bother."

"Not at all please enjoy your stay, ladies. Now here are your keys and at the same time feel free to browse the food locales just down the hall. I know I have."

The English pair shared a laugh with the clerk before thinking over what to do now that they were here.

Emily wasting no time returning the hug, god she simply couldn't explain how much she loved the quirky brunette in her arms.

"Now let's get to it and stuff ourselves silly." Lena boasted as she and Emily walked hand in hand into the dinning area.

"Let's not get ahead of ourselves, Lena, remember we're going to be here for some time I'd like to enjoy my time here and no spend it all in a food coma." Emily stated seriously but couldn't help but break into a laugh. Lena seem to have that effect on her no matter how stern she'd try to be.

"We're on vacation Emily we get to live a little. Besides in my line of work I'd shed off any excess poundage in a heartbeat."

"Alright you win sweetie but please let's not talk about your hero work, you know it's one of the things I love about you but we finally have some time to ourselves." Emily pointed out with a sort of pleading look flashing briefly in her eyes.

"Sure sure thing love." Lena giving Emily a quick peck on the cheek, "No more of that and just us from now on!"

Staring downward at her flat smooth stomach she smiled awkwardly but she reminded herself it was for Lena and she would do anything to see Lena smile and who knows maybe it would help out her curves now that she knew Lena would certainly love.

13531221.content:
Little information about the mission was given.

Location: A new hotel in an unknown location.

The purpose: Find out who the target is then????

All that was known is that the target has been staying at this very hotel for about two weeks. Once she finds out who the target is, she is to open the next set of instructions and carry them out. As to what they are is unknown to her at the moment.

In the midst of the night, Widowmaker made her way to the roof of an extremely large hotel using a grappling hook on her wrist. She perches on top of the roof and scans the massive surrounding property. Due to what little light Widow had she could barely make out what things were. However, the smell of freshly cooked food invaded her smelling senses from the ground.

“There’s something strange about this place. The target must be inside.”

The halls of the hotel are extremely elegant. Vague memories of vacations she and her late husband Gerard would take played in her head, “…Gerard…” she sighed leaning against the wall. Memories of old and the brainwashing from Talon fought in the space they shared, yet as usual the brainwashing shook off the good memories and made Widow focus back on the mission.

The sound of footsteps echoed in her ear.

Widow ducks behind the vending machine with a hushed breath as the footsteps continue along the tiled floor. Closer and closer the footsteps came and with it Widowmaker was able to provide details about the target. The target breathed audibly, sounded labored with hefty pants from minimal exercise. Accompanied by the footsteps that sounded heavy and slow. The target is obviously a person large in stature, it’s especially easy to tell with that sound of munching following their footsteps.

The sound of echoing footsteps comes to a peak and then slowly decline as they go down the hall. By the time Widowmaker glanced over the vending machine, the person had already continued down the corridor. She was able to make out a physical description purely based on sound.

What happens next?
13531221.title: Widowmaker

choices: Carry out the mission regardless of the condition

135312213.content:
Widowmaker peaked her head around the corner, in just that moment of hesitation the target had gone out of sight.

The only telltale sign remaining is the sight of a door down the hall that closed suddenly. Widow took no time to think as her legs pumped when she silently sprinted down the hall and slipped into the room. Inside, it was pitch black without a single sign of another occupant inside. Widow activated the night vision on her head gear and took a step forward.

“Aaah...” Widow grunted when the motion sensing light in the room cams on and blinded her temporarily. When her eyes came too Widow was surprised to see piles of candy scattered about the room which was much smaller than she initially thought. It shared the dimensions of a medium sized storage closet.

Her nose picked up the heavy scent of sweet chocolate coming from every morsel of candy around the room. Widow clutched her rifle and turned to leave, but couldn’t bring herself to get closer to the door. She couldn’t pinpoint the odd sensation, there was something compelling her to taste the candy.

Just one.

Her heels clacked on the barely clear floor when she approached one piece of peanut butter and chocolate candy. Widowmaker’s fingers pinched the wrapper and freed the chocolate from its container. Right after, her tongue danced on what little her teeth sunk into.

Just one.

After the initial taste, Widowmaker’s self control was nowhere to be seen. The sudden chocolate craving overwhelmed her conscious forcing her to eat more and more until everything was gone. The sensation from the taste alone felt similar to getting a kill with a clean headshot. The ecstasy made her feel amazing...almost alive again.

Widowmaker sat in the room surrounded with empty wrappers. Her bloated, distended stomach rested in her lap, gurgling and grumbling audibly. Once Widow came too, she quickly assessed the situation and concluded that continuing her mission is futile unless proceeded with extreme caution.

“I’ll be spotted in an instant with this,” she thought poking her bloated midsection.

Pit sighed but smiled anyway it was just like Lady Palutena to be kind yet teasing in the same sentence. So in the end the angel made his leave leaving the green-haired goddess to her own devices.

Entering the high class hotel Palutena's royal clothing made her seem like one of the regulars she smiled and waved at some of the others passing her by and noticed that some seem to be a bit thicker then usual but she made no mention of it, after all she was blessed with a divine figure but she wasn't a mean girl about it...well only to Viridi if she felt like it.

That said she was about to check in when some delicious aromas whiffed in and around her nose. Her divine stomach slightly rumbling with hunger.

13533222211.content:
“Mandatory leave for vacation. How embarrassing.” Chun-Li’s constant refusal of taking days off went so far as to get the Head of Interpol involved. This resulted in Chun-Li taking two weeks off at the resort or be punished with a mandatory lay-off from the force. Chun-li slid set her phone aside the desk. The written email that was sent to her after the whole ordeal made her grind her teeth.

Chun-Li looked around and immediately noticed of how spacious everything in the lobby was. A massive couch, a massive snacking area near the doors, massive…everything. Almost as if this place was built to house someone twice Hugo’s size.

“Ah, yes.” The receptionist said walking from the back, “Chun-Li Xiang. Room 303. Hope you enjoy your stay! Be sure to try the food here too!”

“Thanks! I’ll try.” She muttered under her breath. Chun-Li turned to be immediately faced by a portly waitress. The waitress pushed a platter of heaping, greasy double cheeseburgers in front of Chun-Li’s face. She grimaced, “Err, no thank you.” The employee briefly looked sad and stepped back the fighter immediate experienced a mood whiplash. Had she really gone so far in her strict ways that she couldn’t allow herself one cheeseburger. Even if it was covered it grease. Something about it looked appetizing.

The Chinese fighter set her belongings inside of her room. She was put off by how oddly spacious that entire place was once again. She plopped down on the bed and pondered her approach towards the situation.

One on hand, letting herself relax for a little bit could give any future opponents that upper hand. On the other hand, being put on mandatory vacation isn’t something she should take for granted. It’s something that rarely ever happens to anyone.

1353322222321132.content:
It had been a good while since Gotham's own Batgirl, Barbara Gordon, had been able to get some good R&R between her studies and defending Gotham on a nightly basis so when Alfred set this vacation up for her Babs after some thought agreed. Admittedly Alfred did wonder why the hotel was named as it was but she passed it off as some kind of eccentric move, passing a side glance at Bruce Wayne causing her and Alfred to share a brief chuckle Bruce was puzzled and unamused.

Arriving with her costume in her bags just in case Barbara texted her father, Commissioner James Gordon, that she had arrived with no problems and thanks for the extra cash. With that done the redhead entered into the building, the indoors was quite lovely and spacious Barbara assumed that they must get many guests and indeed they did there were numerous people coming and going, and that she meant to spy but some appeared quite chubby and downright thick.

'Well it is a vacation the service must be real nice.' Barbara thought for a moment as she eyed her own stomach, "Going to have to make sure I don't go too overboard." she muttered to herself amusingly just as she approached the front desk.

Signing and briefly chatting with the friendly girl working the front desk Barbara took her room key, it was time for her vacation to begin.

To her surprise Babs spots one of Batman's female rogues

A smile crossing her lips she could always relax in her bedroom later and while she wasn't exactly in a swimsuit her casual attire of a purple tanktop with a jean jacket and shorts lend itself well to lounging on around the pool.

Asking a bellboy to take her bags, her batsuit was locked away seal-tight so there was no one anyone was sneaking a peek at it, to her room. The young man did as told with a smile he must've found her cute to look at Babs thought as she chuckled to herself a minute or two later she was arriving at the pool area.

Again she took in the sights and sounds of so many various guests although again she noticed a few, especially of the women, were packing a bit of poundage on them. Suite life I'm sure, she reassured herself once more.

Finding a table with a well placed umbrella Barbara sat down stretching her legs a bit as a employee came up to her asking if she had any sort of drink in mind. Her dad would never forgive her if she got flat-line drunk on vacation plus she wasn't really one for too much liquor so she went something smooth and fruity. The worker girl nodded stating she'd be right back Gordon telling her to take her time no need to stress the staff.

Relaxing once more Babs sat back enjoying the sights and sounds of the area around her as she awaited her drink.

choices: See what our room is like!
1353322222322122221.content:
"Yes, finally! Finally I'm out of that prison!"

Monika let out a cheer as she straightened up. Stretching her arms, followed by her legs and finally her neck, she revelled in the new sensations her body could feel. However, as much as she'd love to hang around and enjoy them, she had two questions.

Where was her reward for escaping that game, the dear player who observed the four of them and ultimately chose her?

And where exactly was she?

"It looks like some sort of... hotel," Monika said to herself, looking around the room she had managed to pull herself into. It was quite a large room, with opulent double doors behind her and a massive desk with a small bell in front of her. Bordering the room were plush brown leather sofas. A few archways led off to different areas, presumably different parts of the hotel, while two grand staircases bordered the desk, each winding off to their respective sides.

"Perhaps my beautiful player is on vacation?" Monika wondered, stepping towards the desk. "Oh, perhaps they knew I was close to escaping and wanted to bring me somewhere romantic?!"

Her heart fluttering at the thought, Monika skipped towards the desk, a massive smile on her face. Upon reaching it, she tapped the bell twice, causing a crystal-clear 'Ding' to echo around the empty lobby. A few seconds passed before a woman in a white shirt and black skirt appeared. Upon sporting Monika, she smiled warmly.

"Ah, you must be Miss Monika!" She greeted. "Congratulations on escaping the Literature Club, and allow me to be the first to welcome you to the real world! Now, I'm sure you're eager to meet the player who chose you, but I'm afraid they haven't checked in yet. However, we are well aware of your... unique situation and have prepared a double room for the two of you! If you'll just sign here..."

Reaching below the desk, the woman produced a sheet of paper, small font completely covering it. Monika was tempted to read it, after all she hadn't a clue where she was, but she was just so excited...

"Done!" She announced, scribbling down her signature.

"That's perfect!" The woman said with a smile. "Now that you're officially signed in as a guest, feel free to avail of our many facilities. Any and all places that sell food on-site are free, so please do take advantage of that. And with that, please, enjoy your stay!"

Boeing her head slightly, the woman left a key on the desk and retreated into the back room. Pocketing the key, Monika turned to face the lobby. While disappointed that her dear player wasn't here yet, she could take this time to grow accustomed to their world.

I wonder what I could do... Monika thought, stepping into the centre of the lobby. Oh, I know!
1353322222322122221.title: Free from the Literature Club

choices: Monika has an odd craving for actual meat...
Letting out a yawn, Monika heads to her room...
13533222223221222211.content:
I should head up to the room! Monika decided. Make sure it's big enough and comfy enough for the two of us...

Giggling excitedly, Monika had just turned to the stairs when her stomach let out a grumble, causing her to blush. A hand gently rubbed her stomach, which gurgled again at her touch.

"Or I could get something to eat!" Monika laughed sheepishly. "I mean, I've never actually eaten anything before! Unless pixels programmed to resemble food counts, in which case I've eaten three meals a day for the majority of my life, but I don't think they do. Now, the restaurant is over here, I believe?"

Heading through one of the archways leading off into the rest of the hotel, it didn't take Monika long until her nose picked up a delicious scent. Pausing, she inhaled deeply, favouring the divine scent for a moment, before she took off at a jog, eager to find whatever was creating such a smell.

It didn't take her long to find it. Rounding a corner, Monika paused as she found herself staring at an immaculate, yet surprisingly empty, restaurant. Pristine white tables with candles atop them and cushioned chairs filled the carpeted room, while in the centre sat a beautiful fountain. Mesmerized by the beauty of the room, Monika jumped whenever a quiet voice caught her attention.

"Welcome to the restaurant, Miss Monika!"

Turning, Monika found a smiling waitress standing next to a nearby table. Heading over to her, she allowed herself to be sat at the table. Expecting a menu of sorts, Monika was surprised when her waitress stalked off, leaving her alone.

"Now exactly am I meant to order without a menu?" She wondered, watching the waitress disappear into a door. However, a few seconds later, she reappeared, a plate held aloft in each hand. Weaving her way towards Monika, she set them down with a smile.

"Lasagne and Quiche!" The waitress announced. "Please, enjoy!"

Monika eyed the steaming lasagne warily for a moment before turning back to the waitress.

"I'm actually a vegetarian," She explained, pointing to the lasagne.

"Oh, we know!" The waitress giggled. "It uses a meat substitute, so please, don't worry!"

"Oh, okay!"

Hungrily digging her fork in, Monika took a cautious bite of the lasagne. She chewed for a moment before smiling. It tasted absolutely heavenly! The way the cheese and pasta complimented the fake meat... She had never eaten anything like it before!

In a surprisingly greedy manner, Monika wasted absolutely no time in shovelling the lasagne into her mouth. Wiping a bit of sauce away from the corner of her mouth, she adjusted her blazer, which felt a little snug all of a sudden, before staring on the quiche, which she discovered was a basic cheese flavour. Even so, it was as delicious as the lasagne, meaning it too quickly vanished into her hungry maw.

"I hope everything was to your liking?" The waitress asked, reappearing at the table as soon as Monika had spooned the last forkful of quiche into her mouth.

"Very much so!" Monika replied, a hand resting on her slightly distended belly.

"Can I get you anything else?" The waitress asked, gathering up the empty plates...
13533222223221222211.title: First taste of real food

info.brief_description: Weight gain story involving characters from anime, cartoons and video games
info.description:
Characters from anime, cartoons and video games end up in a place called the Hotel of Gluttons where they inevitably gain some weight.

Rules:
-No character deaths
-Both male and female allowed
-Male only and female only sections
-No age limits
-Other fetishes allowed: Inflation, hyper, slob and giant/giantess
-Fetishes not allowed: Anything else
-Not all characters have to gain weight, but at least one does (ie. feeder/feedee is allowed)
-No limits on maximum size: make them as big as you want!
-Any types of relationships and sex are allowed

If a chapter does not follow the above rules is subject to being removed.

Credit to DemonGod18 for the idea for the interactive.
